languages.text: "Не каждый способен с честью принять смерть. Слабость порождает ересь, и тогда другие должны упокоить прогнившие души, задержавшиеся на этом свете!"

traits.locale_text: "Мне жаль этих людей, но им следовало умереть с достоинством, а не поддаваться подобной ереси. Я с радостью упокою их огнем!"

languages.text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"
languages.original_text: "Не каждый способен с честью принять смерть. Слабость порождает ересь, и тогда другие должны упокоить прогнившие души, задержавшиеся на этом свете!"

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone can face death with honor. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"
"Not everyone can face death with honor. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"
"Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"
"Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"
"Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

languages.text: 「誰もが名誉を持って死に向き合えるわけではない。弱さは異端を生み、まだこの世界にしがみついている腐敗した魂を、他の者たちは安らかに眠りにつかせてやらなければならない！」
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: 「誰もが名誉を持って死に向き合えるわけではない。弱さは異端を生み、まだこの世界にしがみついている腐敗した魂を、他の者たちは安らかに眠りにつかせてやらなければならない！」

languages.text: « Tout le monde n'est pas capable d'affronter la mort avec honneur. La faiblesse engendre l'hérésie, et c'est aux survivants qu'il incombe d'apporter le repos aux âmes corrompues qui refusent de quitter notre monde ! »
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde n'est pas capable d'affronter la mort avec honneur. La faiblesse engendre l'hérésie, et c'est aux survivants qu'il incombe d'apporter le repos aux âmes corrompues qui refusent de quitter notre monde ! »

languages.text: “面对死亡时，并非所有人都能心怀荣耀。软弱会滋生异端，如果那些堕落的灵魂依然在这个世界苟延残喘，那必须有人把他们消灭掉！”
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: “面对死亡时，并非所有人都能心怀荣耀。软弱会滋生异端，如果那些堕落的灵魂依然在这个世界苟延残喘，那必须有人把他们消灭掉！”

languages.text: «No todo el mundo puede afrontar la muerte con honor. La debilidad da pie a la herejía y, por ende, ¡los demás hemos de dar descanso a las almas corruptas que aún se aferran a este mundo!».
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: «No todo el mundo puede afrontar la muerte con honor. La debilidad da pie a la herejía y, por ende, ¡los demás hemos de dar descanso a las almas corruptas que aún se aferran a este mundo!».

languages.text: "Nicht jeder kann sich dem Tod mit Ehre stellen. Schwäche führt zu Ketzerei, und dann müssen die anderen die korrupten Seelen zur Ruhe betten, wenn sie sich noch an diese Welt klammern!"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht jeder kann sich dem Tod mit Ehre stellen. Schwäche führt zu Ketzerei, und dann müssen die anderen die korrupten Seelen zur Ruhe betten, wenn sie sich noch an diese Welt klammern!"

languages.text: "Herkes ölüme onurla yürümez. Zayıflık, kâfirliğe yol açar; yozlaşmış ruhların hâlâ bu dünyaya tutunmaya çalışması durumunda diğerlerinin onları son yolculuklarına uğurlaması gerekir!"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone can face death with honour. Weakness begets heresy, and then the others must lay the corrupt souls to rest if they are still clinging to this world!"

traits.locale_text: "Herkes ölüme onurlu bir şekilde yürümez. Zayıflık, kâfirliğe yol açar ve sonrasında diğerleri, yozlaşmış ruhlar hâlâ bu dünyaya tutunmaya çalışıyorsa onları son yolculuklarına uğurlamakla görevlendirilirler!"
